sourcesContent:
import {styled} from '@mui/material/styles'
import { List,Box, ListItem } from '@mui/material'
import React from 'react'

const BannerCateg = ({responsive}) => {

    const BannerListItem= styled(ListItem)(()=>({
        [responsive.desk]:{width:'25%'},
        [!responsive.desk]:{width:'50%'}
        
    }))
    
  return (
    
    // con flex que tenga condicional de 50% si es mediano, pequeño, de 25% si es grande
    <Box >
        <List sx={{display:'flex', flexDirection:'row', flexWrap:'Wrap', width:'100%'}}>
            <BannerListItem sx={{}}>
                algo
            </BannerListItem>
            <BannerListItem sx={{width:'50%',[responsive.desk]:{width:'25%'},[!responsive.desk]:{width:'50%'}}}>
                algo
            </BannerListItem>
            <BannerListItem sx={{width:'50%',[responsive.desk]:{width:'25%'},[!responsive.desk]:{width:'50%'}}}>
                algo
            </BannerListItem>
            <BannerListItem sx={{[responsive.desk]:{width:'25%'},[!responsive.desk]:{width:'50%'}}}>
                algo
            </BannerListItem>
        </List>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default BannerCateg
